K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495a-1: dh'a dz'a gra na n'a ma ma h'a s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495a-3: mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-0: @495b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-1: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-2: bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed du yul rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du phyin nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-3: de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po yul rdo 'jug tu tshong bar bya ba'i phyir yul rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar chas pa'i yangs pa can gyi tshong ba rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed du yul rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-4: thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-5: mang po nas mang por lhags shing 'dus te yangs pa can nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po phyogs bcig tu 'khod pa dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-7: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzengs bstod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-8: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:495b-9: rnam grangs du mar chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-2: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cad mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-3: de nas yangs ba can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-7: yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po yul rdo 'jog tu 'jal tshong bgyi ba'i slad du yul rdo 'jog tu mchig bar chas pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-8: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung pas gnang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496a-10: de nas yangs pa can gyi tshong ba rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-0: de nas yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag legs @496b par sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te gdan dag bshams shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-1: chur dag kyang bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa gdugs tshong sbyar te dus la bab lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-5: de nas yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dag la ;'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-8: gal te khyed cag dgon par son pa na 'jigs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-10: spu zing zhes byed pa bskyes par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-11: de'i tshe khyed kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:496b-13: rig pa dang zhags su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-2: skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-3: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-5: zhes nga rnam pa las yang dag par rjes su dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-7: de'i tshe khyed kyis nga rnam pa las yang dag par rjes su dran par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-10: spu zing zhes byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-11: gal te nga mi dran na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-12: legs par gsungs pa; yang dag par mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-16: 'di mthong ba la don yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-17: mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-18: zhes chos rnam pa las yang dag par rjes su dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-20: de'i tshe khyed kyis chos rnams las yang dag par rjes su dran par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-22: spu zing zhes byed par 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de med par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497a-28: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497b-0: chos kyi rjes su @497b mthun par spyod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497b-1: dge 'dun la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs par dag kyang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497b-2: dge 'dun la rgyun du zhugs pa dag kyang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497b-3: dge 'dun la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dag kyang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497b-4: dge 'dun la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dag kyang yod /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:497b-14: ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:498a-1: khyed kyis dge 'dun rnam pa las yang dag par rjes su dran par byas nas 'jig pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:498a-3: spu zing zhes byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:498a-5: sngon lha dang lha ma yin gyi g-yul nye bar gnas par gyur pa na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa; grogs po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:498a-6: gal te khyed cag lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:498a-7: lha ma yin gyi g-yul du zhugs pa na 'jigs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:498a-8: bag tsha ba'am; spu zing zhes byed pa skye bar gyur na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gi spyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-3: tshong pa zas dang skom dag gis /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-5: blo ldan 'phags pa gang byed bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-6: sbyin pa bde legs rjod pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-7: tshong ba khyed kyis byin pas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-8: khyed cag don gang legs 'dod pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-9: khyed kyi don de rtag grub shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-10: khyed kyi rkang gnyis bde legs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-11: khyed kyi rkang bzhi bde legs shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-12: khyed cag lam zhugs bde legs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-13: phyir ldog pa na'ang bde legs shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-14: mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-15: nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-16: khyed cag kun tu bde legs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-17: khyed la sdig pa ma 'byung zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-18: ji ltar zhing ni phun sum la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-19: sa bon phun sum tshogs btab cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-20: char pa phun sum tshogs gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-21: lo tog phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-22: gnas med phun sum tshogs gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-23: skye ba phun sum tshogs gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-24: rgyas pa phun sum tshogs gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-25: lo tog phun sum tshogs 'gyur ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500a-26: de bzhin tshul khrims phun tshogs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-0: kha zas phun sum @500b tshogs byin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-1: phun sum tshogs phyir de byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-3: de phyir phun sum tshogs 'dod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-4: phun sum tshogs don gnyer gang zag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-5: shes rab phun tshogs bstan gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-6: des ni phun sum tshogs pa 'grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-7: de phyir bla med sangs rgyas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-8: chos dang dge 'dun dag la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-9: brtan pa dang bskyed byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-10: de sems phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-11: rig dang zhabs su ldan pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-12: phun sum tshogs pa'i sems thob nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-13: dge ba'i las rnams byed gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-14: de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-15: 'jig rten yang dag bzhin shes na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-16: lta ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-17: 'phags shing mthong ba phun tshogs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-18: yid ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-19: dri ma thams cad bcom byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-20: mya ngan 'das pa phun sum thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-21: sdug bsngal zad par byed pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-22: de yi don ni phun sum yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-26: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-27: rnam grangs du mar chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:500b-30: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:501a-0: @501a *// mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:501a-1: rgya gar gyi mkhan bo dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-071-007:501a-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
